GET /:id.desc: returns an account object for certain account given it's id

POST /accounts.desc: creates and returns and new account using the posted object

PUT /:id.desc: update and return the matching account using the posted object

GET /facilities.desc: returns all facilities under a certain account given the account id

GET /facilities/:id.desc: return one facility represented by it's id

POST /facilities.desc: creates and returns and new facility to an account using the account id and posted object

PUT /facilities/:id.desc: update and return the matching facility using the posted object

GET /residents.desc: returns all residents within a certain facility given the facility id

GET /residents/:id.desc: returns one resident represented by it's id

POST /residents.desc: creates and returns and new resident to a facility using the facility id and posted object

PUT /residents/:id.desc: update and return the matching resident using the posted object
